body:
KITAS GRAPHIC's FOR FREE! :D

Help Kitatist to make his dream true to become  an IRL graphic designer!

Also, please read the entire post!*



Note: Scoll Down To See An Amazing Portafolio 




Hi! Welcome to my graphic petition post!

I made over 1000 banners, renders and any graphics in this past summer (2014), but i carry on!



Remember all is free AND custom!

To sumbit something only describe me your request and in a short periode of time you will have your image ready!



How to apply

Firstly:



- Text
- Background
- Colour theme 
- Style or Font 



I need you to apply "cleanly and easy to undrestand", if not I might dont understand what u want and u will get skiped!

Also a requisit is please subscribe to my youtube channel, www.youtube.com/user/kitatist , then on the purchase tell me ur YT ign so I can check if u suscribed!

How do I work?

Easy! You made you request wich I add down the OP, if I finish the first's purchases I get the next, then your request gots the status of WIP, wich means that im designing it on a sheet of paper (I do this every time, cuz im really good ad drawing :P). Then I prepare the most elements I will need to start the speedart, I open camptasiarecorder and I press start!
If you request is relly interesting I may made a short video called "speed art", where you can see how the graphic was made, uploaded to my YT Channel.

Also remeber, please subscribe to it for more stuff like this, it helps me alot!

IMPORTANT: I need you to give me credit about the img...! Its important for me, because seeing people with ur stuff raving arround inspires into doing more! :D


You can ask me ANYTHING any type of banner render etc...


Here are some examples of the ordering:

**YoutubeBanners**

A custom feature for your channel! :D

**YoutubeIcons**

The youtube Icon wich you can put on your channel!

**Minecraft 3D Skin Render**

A cool 3D Character of your skin!

You need to give me ur skin please, I need it  :wink: 

You can ask me for having something in the hand like a sword or a wool!

**Amazing Team Banners [Currently Down]**

You can switch between 3D or 2D, in both cases I will need the player IGN's, if its 3D I also need the skin.png ... This is a REQUISIT, if u not display me this you will be skiped.

If u ask for this u may wait really alot, cuz its really dificult! :worried: !

**Minecraft 3D Map renders**

Ypu want to see ur map converted into 3D? Ask me! You may provide me the download link! :D

**MiniWebsiteBadges**

U know like the admin badge: Tell me color and text! ;)

**Circle Heads:**

A circle avatar with an optional text!

**Custom InVideo Bagdes!**

Little strips you can put in your videos!

**Posters:**

Optional Text/Color, BG Color with a cool 3D Render!

**Custom YT Miniatures:**

All is Custom! ^^

**Square Skin Banners:**

Your square skin with 2 custom Items/Blocks abd Custom BG!

**Sword Heads**

You player head with 2 Custom Swords Acrosed, also an optional Shield as BG!

**Yt intros and outros:**

All is Custom! ^^

I also do any thunambail, only oreder it ^^
-------------------------------------------


PORTFOLIO (UPDATED LAST 24/03/15)

Looking for something seriouse: ---> http://kitatistgfx.blogspot.com.es/

replies.body:
Dual (In FX terms) means 2 or more people working on one project but each of them doing a different part of the project.

So lets say me and you were making a banner for someone, We could decide that I will make the C4D renders, and you will finish it up with photoshop or any other image editing programs.

:)
replies.body_tagged:

So lets say me and you were making a banner for someone, We could decide that I will make the C4D renders, and you will finish it up with photoshop or any other image editing programs.

:)
